China slams foreign criticism of upcoming Hong Kong's Article 23 national security lawChina on Thursday criticised British Foreign Secretary David Cameron and other foreign politicians for "smearing" an upcoming Hong Kong security law, as local authorities said feedback on the law had been largely positive. Thu, 29 Feb 2024 08:05:25 GMT TYXRJHV75ZPZ5AWBL7AEPGLIVI https://www.reuters.com/world/china/china-slams-foreign-criticism-upcoming-hong-kongs-article-23-national-security-2024-02-29/Jessie Pang, James Pomfret世界中国
Chinese firms step up hiring, but tight-fisted on payChinese university graduate Zhang Baichuan travels hundreds of kilometres from one job fair to another in a final push to find a better offer than the unappealing one he received after more than 1,000 applications. Thu, 29 Feb 2024 07:56:47 GMT TMFSEHSYPBOKFEH7AUWZKFQLUU https://www.reuters.com/world/china/chinese-firms-step-up-hiring-tight-fisted-pay-2024-02-29/Ellen Zhang, Xiaoyu Yin, Marius Zaharia世界中国
Haleon sees sluggish first quarter growth on tepid flu season, China demandBritish consumer healthcare giant Haleon said on Thursday its first-quarter organic revenue growth would slow, citing a tepid cold and flu season and cooling China demand. Thu, 29 Feb 2024 07:09:08 GMT 27BX6U3ILRM37N25OLXQI4AXYM https://www.reuters.com/business/retail-consumer/consumer-health-giant-haleon-sees-higher-revenue-2024-2024-02-29/Reuters商业零售与消费品
Exclusive: SpaceX's talks with Vietnam over Starlink on holdSpaceX's plans to provide communications services to Vietnam with its Starlink satellites have been put on hold, three sources familiar with the matter said, halting support for Vietnamese coast guard drones. Thu, 29 Feb 2024 06:40:46 GMT 4BMXHWPDMZOZBLI26SEP3HTBJA https://www.reuters.com/technology/space/spacexs-talks-with-vietnam-over-starlink-hold-sources-say-2024-02-29/Francesco Guarascio技术空间
'No role' for China in Pacific policing, Australian minister saysAustralia's Pacific Minister Pat Conroy said there should be "no role" for China in policing the Pacific Islands, and Australia will train more local security forces to fill gaps, after Reuters reported Chinese police are working in Kiribati. Thu, 29 Feb 2024 06:09:28 GMT CDE6SENRFVLW7DLNE7LW3RRSCE https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/no-role-china-pacific-policing-australian-minister-says-2024-02-29/Kirsty Needham世界亚太地区
China's Feb factory activity likely contracted for fifth monthChina's manufacturing activity likely contracted for a fifth straight month in February, a Reuters poll showed on Thursday, possibly increasing the clamour for further stimulus measures as factory owners struggle for orders both at home and abroad. Thu, 29 Feb 2024 05:12:03 GMT NOWYYBC3FBNXXIU5FHOOLFELGQ https://www.reuters.com/markets/asia/chinas-feb-factory-activity-likely-contracted-fifth-month-2024-02-29/Joe Cash市场宏观问题
